title: Process Definition Document - Agentic Uplift Schema
description: A document to organize data showing how an AI Agent can help lower costs, errors, and time-to-complete of a business process

agentificationSteps.description: Steps within the ANALYZED_PDD which could benefit from agentification

stepNumber.description: The DETAILED_PROCESS_STEP_NUMBER in the ANALYZED_PDD from the DETAILED_PROCESS_STEPS section

stepDescription.description: The DETAILED_PROCESS_STEP_DESCRIPTION in the ANALYZED_PDD from the DETAILED_PROCESS_STEPS section

hasAgenticPotential.description: A yes or no describing whether or not the step has agentic potential

agenticPotentialConfidenceScore.description: The confidence score of the HAS_AGENTIC_POTENTIAL value

agenticPotentialConfidenceReason.description: The reasonining used to determine both HAS_AGENTIC_POTENTIAL and AGENTIC_POTENTIAL_CONFIDENCE_SCORE
